channel.title: I can't get to get my server online
channel.description: i have done this at my house but never has this been so complicated I've tried to every thing i remember to get it online,port ford on router, a no i ip and run it Ive ran the server and played it localy but it wont let me connect to my own ip address 67.232.252.225\ it will work wen i put in 0.0.0.0 or 192.168.1.1 and wen i try to do it with 67.232.252.225 it says error connecting to server for me oleasse i need your help( it might have something to do with the firwalls but i forget how to edit those....

item.title: I can't get to get my server online

item.description:
@fly341 wrote:

i have done this at my house but never has this been so complicated I’ve tried to every thing i remember to get it online,port ford on router,
a no i ip and run it
Ive ran the server and played it localy but it wont let me connect to my own ip address 67.232.252.225
it will work wen i put in 0.0.0.0 or 192.168.1.1 and wen i try to do it with 67.232.252.225 it says error connecting to server for me
oleasse i need your help( it might have something to do with the firwalls but i forget how to edit those…
